sourcesContent:
{[info.description1, info.description2, info.description3, info.description4] .filter(Boolean) // Исключаем пустые описания .map((description, idx) => (
handleDescriptionClick(description)} style={{ cursor: 'pointer', color: description === selectedDescription ? 'blue' : 'black', fontWeight: description === selectedDescription ? 'bold' : 'normal', }} > {description}
))}
